EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify approvers of a new pending Leave Request
EmailTemplate.name: Leave Request Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval for Leave Request from {!Leave_Request__c.OwnerFullName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A new Leave Request requires your Approval
{!Leave_Request__c.OwnerFullName} has requested your approval for the following Leave Request :
Type : {!Leave_Request__c.Leave_Type__c}
From {!Leave_Request__c.From__c} to {!Leave_Request__c.To__c}
Notes from requester :
{!Leave_Request__c.Notes__c}
To approve or reject this item, reply to this email with the word APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, or NO in the first line of the email message.
If replying via email you can also add comments on the
second line. The comments will be stored with the approval
request.
Note: For salesforce.com to process your response the word APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, or NO must be in the very first line of the reply email. Also, any comment must be in the second line.
